activities.script: Walk to the Echo. Say 'Alexa, what is the weather'. Walk away.
Walk to the Echo. Say 'Alexa, play some music'. Let it play for a while and say 'Alexa, stop.' Walk away.
Walk to the Echo. Do nothing for 5 seconds. Walk away.
Walk towards the Nest Camera. Do nothing for 5 seconds. Walk out of the view.
Walk to the Nest Camera. Say 'OK Google, what's the time?'. Walk away.
Do not appear in the camera view. Do nothing for 5 seconds.
